common_themes: Custom phase node validation gap (mentioned by 4 reviewers)

findings.title: Custom Phase Nodes Lack Policy Validation
findings.description: Found 17 instances where custom phase nodes (backend, frontend, architecture, services) have no SLO definitions
findings.impact: These nodes bypass policy validation entirely, creating blind spots in quality enforcement

examples.message: No SLO found for phase: backend
No SLO found for phase: frontend
No SLO found for phase: backend

findings.title: 4 Test Cases Failed
findings.description: Tests failed: medium-02, medium-04, complex-04, edge-02
findings.impact: Indicates gaps in handling expected failure scenarios or policy enforcement inconsistencies

details.error: Connectivity is undefined for the null graph.

findings.title: Legacy Contract Validation Inactive
findings.description: Legacy validation skipped in 51 node executions (no output_dir)
findings.impact: Backward compatibility path is not exercised, potential issues undetected

findings.title: Parallel Execution Works
findings.impact: System can handle concurrent workflow execution - major scalability win

recommendations: Define SLO policies for custom node types or implement a generic validation template for non-standard phases
Review failure propagation logic for non-standard phase nodes to ensure consistent blocking behavior
Either activate legacy validation testing or deprecate if policy-based validation is sufficient

findings.title: Pass Rate: 80.0% (16/20 tests)
findings.description: 4 tests failed validation, all related to custom phase node handling
findings.impact: System functional for standard SDLC phases but has gaps for custom workflows

findings.title: 81 Gate Condition Evaluation Errors
findings.description: Multiple gates failed to evaluate due to missing metric fields
findings.impact: Gates marked as WARNING instead of being evaluated properly

findings.title: Node Pass Rate: 94.2% (49/52 nodes)
findings.impact: High node reliability indicates robust execution engine

findings.title: Complexity Range: 1-7 (avg: 3.1)
findings.impact: Comprehensive coverage across simple to complex scenarios

findings.title: Excellent Performance: 0.34s average per test
findings.impact: Fast validation enables rapid iteration and developer productivity

recommendations: Expand test scenarios to cover edge cases with custom phase types before production
Audit phase_slos.yaml gate conditions to ensure all referenced metrics are documented as required outputs
Add validation to fail fast if executor doesn't return required metrics for a phase

findings.title: Retry Logic Validated
findings.impact: System has built-in resilience for transient failures

findings.title: Wide Parallelism: 6 Concurrent Nodes
findings.description: System handles multiple parallel executions successfully
findings.impact: Can scale to microservices architectures with many parallel services

findings.title: Edge Case Handling: 2/3 Passed
findings.impact: Empty workflow handling needs improvement - may cause issues in production

findings.title: Deployment & Monitoring Phases Tested
findings.description: Full SDLC pipeline including deployment validated
findings.impact: System ready for production deployment workflows

recommendations: Add defensive checks for empty/malformed workflows before execution

findings.title: Security Gate Testing: 1/1 Passed
findings.description: Security vulnerability gates are enforced and tested
findings.impact: Security blocking gates prevent vulnerable code from progressing

findings.title: 1 Security Gates Validated
findings.impact: Multiple security checkpoints in workflow lifecycle

findings.title: Security Vulnerabilities Properly Block Workflows
findings.impact: System enforces zero-vulnerability policy at security gates

findings.title: Security Review in Design Phase
findings.description: Security gates enforced early in SDLC (design phase)
findings.impact: Shift-left approach catches security issues before implementation

findings.title: Custom Phases Lack Security Validation
findings.description: 10 instances of custom phases with no security gates
findings.impact: Backend, frontend, and service nodes bypass security validation entirely

recommendations: Define security gates for all custom phase types (backend, frontend, services)
Implement mandatory security scanning for all node types, not just 'implementation' phase

priority_recommendations.recommendation: Define SLO policies for custom node types or implement a generic validation template for non-standard phases
Define security gates for all custom phase types (backend, frontend, services)
Add defensive checks for empty/malformed workflows before execution

priority_recommendations.rationale: Improvement opportunity identified by team leads

priority_recommendations.rationale: Improvement opportunity identified by team leads

production_readiness.reasoning: Core functionality validated, but known limitations exist for custom workflows
next_steps: Document known limitations for custom phase types
Create monitoring for bypassed validation scenarios
Plan Phase 1 improvements for custom node support
